name: Rogue Ascent
description:
ROGUE ASCENT EARLY ACCESS BEGINS NOW!

Rogue Ascent VR is an upcoming experimental Procedurally-Generated Sci-Fi Shooter controlled seamlessly by Oculus hand-tracking technology. Discover and combine countless weapons types, attachment modifications, abilities, gadgets, perks, and powerups as you blast and beguile past teams of formidable foes. The completed gameplay experience will features many added items, secrets, perks, abilities, enemy types, game modes, bosses, biomes, achievements, and competitive online leaderboards for you to challenge your friends (or rivals!).

Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/TG8FJ8vtWe
Visit our Website: http://rogueascent.com
Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/RogueVr

Get Early Access and Closed Beta Access! Early Access ($19.99): 

Get monthly updates to Rogue Ascent before it fully launches later this year

Closed Beta Access & Early Access ($29.99): 

Get weekly updates to Rogue Ascent and help the developers directly with issues until it fully launches later this year
